name: Cozy Fishing
description:
"A game where you can relax and fishing"

Need something to relax after a busy day? Want to play a game but don't want to think much? Want to play a wholesome game but only for fishing?
Cozy Fishing is here for you. In this game, you don't need to think about managing yourself.
Just relax and keep fishing. Catch all the fish and fill up your Aquarium!

Features

"Fish in different biomes"
In Cozy Fishing you can fish in 4 different locations, Lake, River, Ocean, and Deep Ocean. Each biome has its unique fish species and you can visit each biome without any restriction.
